nodes.text: Lipsec was an Outer Rim Territories astronomical object located in the grid square I-18 of the Standard Galactic Grid. A hyperspace route connected it to the Virgillia system.

Lipsec was first depicted in the new Star Wars canon on a galactic map in Star Wars: The Force Awakens Beginner Game, a 2016 Fantasy Flight Games' Star Wars Roleplaying boxed set. The Lipsec system was originally introduced in the Star Wars Legends continuity, where it was first mentioned in the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, written by Daniel Wallace and Jason Fry.
